articles.author: Chris Pandolfo
articles.title: ISIS using Afghanistan as staging ground for terror plots after US withdrawal: report - Fox News
articles.description: A classified intelligence assessment leaked online reveals that Islamic State terrorists operating in Afghanistan have been plotting attacks in Europe, Asia and the United States since President Biden's withdrawal in 2021.
articles.content: Not even two years have passed since President Biden's fumbled military withdrawal from Afghanistan, and already Islamic State terrorists are using the country to plot attacks across Europe and Asia.… [+4033 chars]
